titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Julia Carson, a Representative of the State of Indiana.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/17/2007--Passed House without amendment. Declares that the House of Representatives has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable Julia Carson, a Representative from the state of Indiana.
